name: NSMergePolicyType
desc: Constants that define merge policy types.

items.name: case errorMergePolicyType
items.desc: The default merge policy for all managed object contexts.

items.name: case mergeByPropertyStoreTrumpMergePolicyType
items.desc: A property-based merge policy that applies external changes.

items.name: case mergeByPropertyObjectTrumpMergePolicyType
items.desc: A property-based merge policy that applies in-memory changes.

items.name: case overwriteMergePolicyType
items.desc: A merge policy type that overwrites the entire stored object.

items.name: case rollbackMergePolicyType
items.desc: A merge policy that discards unsaved changes.
